title: EVENTS
slogan: Discover our community events and initiatives

events.title: Kemba Charity Event
events.description: Thrilled to be part of the Kemba Charity Event! We were honored to participate in this year's event, which was filled with incredible generosity and community spirit. A huge thank you to everyone who helped make it a success.

events.title: Make-A-Day
events.description: Proud to join the Make-A-Day event, where we come together to support our community and build a better future for all! As leaders in architecture and construction, we believe that building strong foundations isn't just about structures; it's about fostering human connections and supporting those in need. Join us and make a difference, because every small step creates a big change.Together, we build a stronger, more united community!

events.title: American Floor Source
events.description: We were thrilled to take part in an exciting event with Columbus Crew and American Floor Source! It was a fantastic opportunity to support the team and share in the excitement with our community. We're deeply committed to being active participants, engaging positively, and making a meaningful impact locally.
